content: i used green and multicolored yarn but you can use any colors you want please do not make a youtube video of this pattern and please ask before selling earrings made of this pattern optional use 1-3 pearls for late beginner/intermediate crocheters you will need per earring -lace weight yarn in two colors -1 5mm hook -1-4 jump rings depending on if you want pearls -jump ring pliers -4cm earring hoop -an earring backing i use silicone one -scissors optional -1-3 pearls -earring card nordicnicola/cranberrycakeart/nicola aaltonen 2024
